example.eg: Do you like the pattern on my shirt?
example.egtrans: 你喜欢我衬衣上的图案吗？

example.eg: The girl arranged the shells in a circle pattern.
Model your design after this pattern.

dsense.name: pattern [sth] on [sth], pattern [sth] after [sth], pattern [sth] upon [sth]⇒

example.eg: This design is patterned after the latest Paris fashions.
example.egtrans: 该设计模仿的是巴黎最新时装款式。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 模仿, 仿造, 仿制

example.eg: Let me give you some carpet patterns to take home to see which matches your house.
example.egtrans: 让我给你一些地毯的样品，你可以带回家去看看哪一款更适合你的房子。

example.eg: You can see the pattern in his behaviour.  He always cries when he gets tired.
example.egtrans: 你可以解读出他的行为模式，他累的时候总是会哭。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 模式化行为, 经常出现的行为, （行为）模式

example.eg: We are going to repeat the same pattern a hundred times.
example.egtrans: 照这个模型，我们要重复100次。

example.eg: Here is the pattern for the new sculpture.
example.egtrans: 这个就是新雕塑的金属铸模。

example.eg: You could see where the gunman had been standing from the pattern of bullets on the wall.
example.egtrans: 你能够从墙上的弹孔分布判断出枪手射击时的站位。

example.eg: The airport changed its flight patterns to decrease the noise level over the town.
example.egtrans: 航空公司变更了航班的航行轨迹来降低给小镇带来的噪音污染。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 飞行路迹, 航行轨迹, 飞行线路

example.eg: I do the sewing and she patterns.
example.egtrans: 我负责针线活，她负责做花样。

example.eg: I am going to pattern my new table with a stencil.
There is a consistent pattern in his behaviour; he always lets you down!

dsense.name: holding pattern
dsense.guideword: (plane: flight path while waiting to land) (飞机：等待着陆时的飞行路线)

example.eg: Ancient Greek pottery makes extensive use of the key pattern.
The TV stations used to end their broadcast day by displaying a test pattern.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 测试图案，测试图形, 测试模式
